name: Flora Paper Serviettes 1Ply
description: Flora Paper Serviettes paves way for you to wipe your hands and mouth better after a meal. It absorbs oil and water much better and does not disintegrate. This also can be used for functions or parties in hotels or at home. You may even use it for wiping and wrapping glasses, cutlery and plates and also cleaning glass windows and table tops. 4 variants are available in the range out of which 2 are Cocktail Napkins. Cocktail Napkin 2 ply 250’s is available in a box used by hotels while the others are in polythene packs. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
